attributes.action: Before cutting welfare taxes scrap the MPs tax free allowances and expenses scam and refinance the country.
attributes.additional_details: It is a grossly immoral group of people - elected MPs and Lords - who take most out of the system while contributing NOTHING to the running of the country, since they allowed the EU to take over, and who create only damage for other people to correct,  and then reduce the availability of cash help to working people - those who ARE contributing to the running of the country - without even CONSIDERING that it SHOULD BE THEY who should be reducing their grossly huge take out from the national finances.
